availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, resident. Muhlenberg County native. Son of Raughley Sullivan and Lucy Sullivan. Postmaster of South Carrollton from 1856 to 1861. Delegate from Muhlenberg County to the Kentucky Democratic Convention in January 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, Subdivision 2, p. 247. Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, (accessed via Ancestry.com). “Democratic Meeting in Muhlenberg County,” Daily Courier (Louisville, Ky.), January 4, 1860.
